member.name: Windows.SslEmptyCache

summary.para: Removes the specified string from the Schannel cache.
This function has no associated import library. You must use the and functions to dynamically link to Schannel.dll.

member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the entry to remove from the cache. If the value of this parameter is NULL, all entries are removed from the cache.
member.returns: Returns nonzero if the specified entries are removed from the Schannel cache or zero otherwise.

member.name: Windows.SslGetServerIdentity
member.summary: The SslGetServerIdentity function gets the identity of the server. This function has no associated import library. You must use the and functions to dynamically link to Schannel.dll.
member.param: The size of the client message.
The pointer inside the message where the server name starts.
The length of the server name.
This parameter is reserved and must be zero.

returns.para: The status of the call to the function.

listheader.description: One of the parameters ClientHello, ServerIdentity, or ServerIdentitySize is NULL.
The ServerIdentitySize parameter is smaller than the ClientHelloSize parameter.
